title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 3 ยง 50.62 - Effect of termination
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 3 ยง 50.62 - Effect of termination

State Regulations

After the adoption of a resolution by the board of
directors or the receipt of notice from the Banking Board directing the
termination of any mutual trust investment company, all shares shall be
redeemed in the same manner as if it were a liquidating
account. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 3
ยง
50.62

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
